newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Anaconda aims to expand Murrin Murrin.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Anaconda aims to expand Murrin Murrin.

text.p: Anaconda Nickel NL said on Tuesday it was looking at expanding capacity at its proposed Murrin Murrin nickel project in Western Australia by 50 percent to 150 million pounds a year.
Chief executive Andrew Forrest told Reuters the increase was based on the availability of more water for the project.

Forrest also said he would announce in a speech to the Australian Nickel conference here later on Tuesday that he had received "firm bids" from an international mining house and international investment group over possible joint venture agreements for Murrin Murrin.
He said the market could bear the additional production and that the company could currently contract for sales in execess of 150 million pounds.
